page.title: 12COMMUNICATION IN HARLOW
page.content: {TELEPHONES}A figure of 84% of families have one or more telephones. 15% of the families hadn't got a telephone at all.We found out that 50% of families had 1 phone, 31% had 2 phones, 4% had 3 phones.Most people use their telephones less than 5 times a day.43% used a telephone at work.13% of people had radio (cordless) telephone. {LETTERS}82% of people send letters. Most people send letters less than 5 times a week.The most popular form of letter writing is sending cards with writing to relatives in second place & in third place paying bills. Some people send letters abroad. {C.B's.}3% of the people we asked used a Citizen Band radio(C.B.).They used it mainly for car to car emergencies, talking to friends,or business. These results were compiled from 74 questionaires.
